tool_description: The Global Trademarks API offers real-time access to trademark records from all offices around the world.
name: Global Trademarks
title: Global Trademarks

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for a keyword and add optional filters like nice class or status.

optional_parameters.name: statuses
optional_parameters.description: An array of strings with values : Registered, Expired, Pending, Unknown
